name: Nat-Portfolio
description: A personal portfolio website showcasing projects and skills, built with Next.js.

name: FindX
description: An AI-powered missing person detection system leveraging facial recognition to help citizens and police locate missing individuals.

name: JudgifySU
description: A constraint-based assignment system for research poster-judge optimization, featuring a Next.js frontend and Flask backend.

name: Anonimo-ML
description: Machine learning components for the Anonimo platform, an anonymous social support system featuring real-time chat and therapist resources.

name: HereAfter
description: Hereafter is a map-based social app where memories take shape in the places you love. Share voice, photos, videos, and notes friends can discover, creating a living community archive built through presence, not performance.
